ygData.subject: Re: Anti-Camping ?
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/10/99 1:05:05 PM Eastern Daylight Time, reuben@creditland.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/10/99 1:05:05 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
reuben@... writes:

<< Other side of water ? .. I haven't ventured far enough into Najena to get
to
her. So is there water in the cave part? or is there another location
elsewhere ? I know that we are headed to get the FBR by the weekend.. so if
there is 2 spots any information would be nice

Also, Wht other rare items are in the dungeon ? I know of the boots, RBR,
backpack ? >>

To get to nejena you have to swim throught a short tunel. Watch out there are
two frglok gouls that spawn in the water, but inv to undead negates there
threat.

Other good items that can be found in Nejena is

1. Stelotto of the bloodclaw.
2. Barbed Leather Whip.
3. tentical whip
4. Black tomb with silver runes
5. glowing black stone
6. Runed Cowell

and of corse the only place to get large bronze.

Wampir
